title: Rustc panics when piped into other commands

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
`rustc` panics when its output is being piped into other commands. I tried this code: ``` $ rustc | grep $ rustc | rg $ rustc | echo ``` ### Meta Bug exists on both stable and nightly builds. ``` rustc 1.62.1 (e092d0b6b 2022-07-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: e092d0b6b43f2de967af0887873151bb1c0b18d3 commit-date: 2022-07-16 host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu release: 1.62.1 LLVM version: 14.0.5 ```
Backtrace
